title: Hulu - USA ONLY
description: NOTE: Geo-Locked To USA ONLY. Videos from Hulu.com IMPORTANT INFO Thanks to NobodyHere: You need to disable all of these settings - "network pre-roll", "pre-roll ads", "trailing ads", "commercial breaks". You also need to set the Default CDN to "akamai". The only issue I've encountered with these settings is that the Fox network programs do not work. This is seemingly due to the way the episodes are segmented into pieces instead of using one larger stream.
disclaimer: Some parts of this addon may not be legal in your country of residence - please check with your local laws before installing.
